title: Winstons favorite - Turkey and Things
directions: Open your crockpot, place all ingredients inside, incrementing stock and stirring while you add all the ingredients.
Once all ingredients have been added to your crockpot - turn crockpot to low and cook for four hours, stirring once an hour to prevent sticking.
aditional_comments: should yield 6 qts, I place mine in 2-quart containers, leaving one out for our next feeding - freezing the left remaining- Look out for a happy pup!

title: Beagles Love Bison
ingredients: 15 oz can of Oragnic Kidney Beans
directions: Open your crockpot, place all ingredients inside, incrementing stock and stirring while you add all the ingredients.
Once all ingredients have been added to your crockpot - turn crockpot to low and cook for four hours, stirring once an hour to prevent sticking.
aditional_comments: should yield 6 qts, I place mine in 2-quart containers, leaving one out for our next feeding - freezing the left remaining- Look out for a happy pup!

title: Chow 'n' Down on Chicken
